text: This is a list of lighthouses in Egypt, which are located along both the Mediterranean and Red Sea coastlines of this North African country. The list includes active maritime lighthouses that are named landfall lights, or that have a range of at least fifteen nautical miles. The Admiralty number is that used in Admiralty List of Lights and Fog Signals Light List. ==Lighthouses== Brothers Islands Lighthouse Daedalus Reef Ras Muhammad Ras Umm Sidd (Sharm el- Sheikh) {| class="wikitable sortable" |- bgcolor="#dfdfdf" !
